name: Curiouscat.me - Dark Theme
description: Because the original light theme burns my eyes out.
additional_info:
Slapped this together in the middle of the night, liable to be incomplete and/or suck. I also suck at coding in general so don't yell at my stylesheet plsandthx.

If anything needs fixing, Tweet me (https://twitter.com/Fyurie/) or send me a message through Curiouscat (https://curiouscat.me/Fyurie).

-- Changelog --
21/05/2017: Assorted updates to broken elements. More skinning for the discover section to come in the future. Solved some more immediate issues for now.

03/02/2017: Skinned the background again. Apparently CC changed the element used for this. Same for the menu bar. Also skinned the top bar of the Your Discussions popup page.

Additionally, added a flag to hide all the scroll bars, felt this looks better for the theme.

21/01/2017: Skinned the discussions panel. Skinned the Followers and Following labels AND popup windows. Skinned the Questions and Replies headers in the notifications section.

Removed accent color selection for the time being. Will wait for the skin to be more complete before adding this back.

08/12/2016 (9): Initial implementation of custom color accent choice. There WILL be parts missing for now.
08/12/2016 (8): Changed the URL color in questions to make it stand out better. White on white wasn't so great.
08/12/2016 (7): Made inputted text readable on the profile page question box, and skinned the questions page answer input box.
08/12/2016 (6): Fixed solid background color appearing when using the edit function.
08/12/2016 (5): Fixed the remove icon being invisible on the questions page.
08/12/2016 (4): Now with added button skins.
08/12/2016 (3): Skinned the padding around the input box on profiles. Thanks @CoffeeFlux for finding the class for my blind ass.
08/12/2016 (2): Skinned the questions box now. Didn't have any last night to skin with.
08/12/2016 (1): Fixed style for the box that hides reactions.
